overview: Passion and infidelity are on the cards as a wealthy couple organizes a get together of family and friends at their luxury Spanish country house. With sun, sangria and the sexiest superstars no relationship is safe. Amazing scenes that only Private can deliver as faithful wives are tempted by a gardener with a very fat hose, the housekeeper creates a very sticky mess and a spoiled teen temptress gets her stepfather to deliver more than her allowance. All of this and more including a steamy foursome, double facials and plenty of anal action. Starring Carol Vega, Lolita Taylor, Tiffany Doll and Violette Pink.
title: Cheating with Friends & Family
